pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Spanish Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau spoke this morning with Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy of Spain.

Prime Minister Trudeau offered his condolences over the recent terrorist attacks in Barcelona and Cambrils.  The Prime Minister expressed thanks for the care and assistance provided to the Canadian victims and their families, and offered congratulations on the effectiveness of Spainâ€™s security forces and first responders.

Prime Minister Rajoy offered his condolences on the death of Ian Wilson and the injury of four other Canadian citizens.

Prime Minister Trudeau and Prime Minister Rajoy discussed the challenge posed by radicalization and reaffirmed their resolve for Canada and Spain to work more closely together to counter violent extremism.
